summary: Baptiste 'Bebel' Lavalle and his classmates in Versailles' private high-school Louis XIV enjoy their carefree life enough to deliberately fail the exams, a national record of zero ... See full summary »
cast: Michel Galabru|Maria Pacôme|Daniel Auteuil|Philippe Taccini|Tonie Marshall|Hubert Deschamps|Raymond Bussières|Georges Anderson|Féodor Atkine|Henri Attal|Gaëtan Bloom|Richard Bohringer|Jean Cherlian|Etienne Draber|Hélène Dublin|Katherine Erhardy|Dominique Hulin|Patrick Laurent|Françoise Michaud|Pétronille Moss|Honoré N'Zué|Marie-Thérèse Orain|Odile Poisson|Magali Renoir|Gilles Roussel|Mathieu Schiffman|Philippe Vallauris|Mohamed Zinet|Patrick Nardon|Patrick Zard
title: Los cateados
